mapper.insert: insert into article (company, title, content, summary, keyword, newspaper, publicationDate, url, image) values (#{company}, #{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{keyword}, #{newspaper}, #{publicationDate}, #{url}, #{image});
mapper.select: select articleid, company, title, summary, newspaper, publicationDate, url, image from article where articleid=#{articleid}
select articleid, company, content, image, keyword, newspaper, publicationDate, summary, title, url from article
